summary: Slightly re textured and improved looking iron shield
descriptionHtml:
I have resized the file and added new textures to the shield to make it look nicer. 

Simply extract the \"iron\" folder into your C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\armor folder. 
If you do not have the \"armor\" folder just create one. 

Feel free to use it as a template and edit it if you want, just don\'t forget to give me credit :)
author: dimi616
